name: Enjoy your life with great foodie taste - 'MUST TRY' before you leave!
description: We always have to eat but TRY this before you leave Malaysia! It's all about 'Taste' but not by environment. Nasi Lemak is the famous "Must-try" food in Malaysia, which can be found everywhere, but the best are only in certain places :). You will also be introduced to some other famous food as well!
